sentences.en: a glass tankard with his initials etched on it
sentences.cn: 刻有他姓名首字母的玻璃大酒杯

sentences.en: Ben Tankard wowed the crowd with his jazz.
sentences.cn: 本·坦卡德的爵士乐使众人为之叫绝。

sentences.en: I poured the beer into a tankard.
sentences.cn: 我把啤酒倒进了大酒杯里.

sentences.en: It is served in a one - liter - tankard called Ma.
sentences.cn: 它被服侍在一单一公升的 - 称为妈的大啤酒杯.

sentences.en: Tankard Reist : The phrase was invented by Phillip Adams, an Australian broadcaster and columnist.
sentences.cn: 坦卡德.瑞斯特: 这个说法是菲利浦.亚当斯发明的, 他是澳大利亚的一名广播员和专栏作家.

trans.tran_en: a large metal cup, usually with a handle, which you can drink beer from
